Trade/Device Name(s): ADVIA Chemistry CardioPhase High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein (hsCRP) Assay
ADVIA Chemistry CardioPhase High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Calibrators
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVIA Chemistry CardioPhase High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein assay and calibrators for quantitative CRP measurement on ADVIA Chemistry systems.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic quantitative determination of C-Reactive Protein (CRP) in human serum and plasma for infection, tissue injury, inflammation evaluation, and as an independent risk marker for future cardiovascular disease; calibrators are for ADVIA Chemistry system calibration for this method.
